remarks: The set of ring isomorphisms.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
statement:
rngisoval.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
rngisoval.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngisoval.3 $e |- J = ( 1st ` S ) $.
rngisoval.4 $e |- Y = ran J $.
rngoisoval $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( R RngIso S ) = { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } ) $.
$d R f $.
$d S f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
